sentence.Network_en: I had new clothes, a new hairstyle — the whole caboodle.
sentence.Network_cn: 我身穿新衣服, 头理新发型,焕然一新.

sentence.Network_en: He said if I bought the whole kit and caboodle, I could have it for peanuts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说如果我全部买下, 只需花很少的钱.

sentence.Network_en: We took along the whole kit and caboodle by the truck.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们用一辆卡车把所有的人和行李都拉走了.
